login.title: Sui Veto DAO
login.hero: Become emboldened by the flame of ambition

card1.title: Decentralized Community Platform
card1.description: A completely decentralized platform powered by blockchain technology, where users can freely create, manage, and interact with communities. All data is stored securely and transparently on the blockchain.

card2.title: Secure and Transparent
card2.description: Not dependent on a central authority. Users have full control over their data. Secure transactions, immutable records, and full transparency are provided with smart contracts. Create, manage, and grow your communities.

card3.title: Sui Veto DAO
card3.description: Decentralized community platform. Create communities, conduct votes, and manage on blockchain.

signModal.title: Sign Message

errors.zkLoginNotSupported: ZkLogin signature scheme is not supported. Please use a standard wallet (Ed25519, Secp256k1, or Secp256r1).
